info.title: Data Gateway - eSign
info.description:
Build the data flow you needâ€”for customer onboarding, background verifications, and collecting electronic signatures.

[See on Setu docs](https://docs.setu.co/data)

We currently support the following data blocks:

**Aadhaar based e-Sign**
Collect legally binding digital signatures. Upload a document and create a signature request for one or more signers.

error.detail: The document Id is already being used in a signature
signers array not provided please check config payload.
